title: Make CPU and CUDA share bernoulli yaml declaration
body_html:
As title. This achieved by:

  • Simply combining the out-of-place declarations, and making sure the macros are defined for both CPU and CUDA
  • Adding a new argument type, BackendTensor, to handle the fact that we want THFloatTensor or THCudaTensor as arguments, depending on which backend we are generating for
